mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wives of University of Virginia students (Cavalier Ladies)
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt on photo: Wives of University of Virginia students -- newly-elected as officers of the Cavalier Ladies, organization of students' wives. They are, left to right, front row, Mrs. A.E. Walker, hostess of the University Center, Mrs. R.K. McLeod, Sumpter, SC, recording secretary, Mrs. John Lamb, Richmond, VA, president, Mrs. Joel H. Vicars, Norton, VA, corresponding secretary. Back row, Mrs. J.S. Galban, wife of a faculty member and a sponsor, and Mrs. Ralph Brumet, Bristol, VA, vice president and treasurer.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
